participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Determined and slightly eccentric, with a flair for creativity.
participant_1.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

participant_2.name: Diego
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and languages, always eager to learn and share knowledge.
participant_2.background: one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i also study languages. my next language to study is french.
